title: Listing Verification Status System
description: 1) All listings published immediately when created. 2) Three verification statuses: not_verified - initial_verification - full_legal_verification. 3) Configurable visibility policy by status (default: show all). 4) Buyers can order but must pay 1000EUR refundable deposit to validate order. Buyer legal flow blocked until seller has full_legal_verification. Deposit refunded if sale fails.
